### [Time](/documentation/kernel/mach_zone_info_t#time)

[`mach_absolute_time`](/documentation/kernel/1462446-mach_absolute_time)Returns current value of a clock that increments monotonically in tick units (starting at an arbitrary point), this clock does not increment while the system is asleep.[`mach_approximate_time`](/documentation/kernel/1462443-mach_approximate_time)[`mach_continuous_time`](/documentation/kernel/1646199-mach_continuous_time)Returns current value of a clock that increments monotonically in tick units (starting at an arbitrary point), including while the system is asleep.[`mach_continuous_approximate_time`](/documentation/kernel/1646198-mach_continuous_approximate_time)[`mach_bridge_remote_time`](/documentation/kernel/2870302-mach_bridge_remote_time)[`mach_bridge_compute_timestamp`](/documentation/kernel/2935668-mach_bridge_compute_timestamp)[`mach_bridge_register_regwrite_timestamp_callback`](/documentation/kernel/2869537-mach_bridge_register_regwrite_ti)[`mach_timebase_info_t`](/documentation/kernel/mach_timebase_info_t)[`mach_zone_info_array_t`](/documentation/kernel/mach_zone_info_array_t)[`mach_zone_name_array_t`](/documentation/kernel/mach_zone_name_array_t)[`mach_timebase_info_data_t`](/documentation/kernel/mach_timebase_info_data_t) Raw Mach Time API In general prefer to use the <time.h> API clock_gettime_nsec_np(3), which deals in the same clocks (and more) in ns units. Conversion of ns to (resp. from) tick units as returned by the mach time APIs is performed by division (resp. multiplication) with the fraction returned by mach_timebase_info().[`mach_timespec_t`](/documentation/kernel/mach_timespec_t)[`clock_attr_t`](/documentation/kernel/clock_attr_t)[`clock_ctrl_port_t`](/documentation/kernel/clock_ctrl_port_t)[`clock_ctrl_t`](/documentation/kernel/clock_ctrl_t)[`clock_flavor_t`](/documentation/kernel/clock_flavor_t)[`clock_id_t`](/documentation/kernel/clock_id_t)[`clock_nsec_t`](/documentation/kernel/clock_nsec_t)[`clock_reply_subsystem`](/documentation/kernel/clock_reply_subsystem)[`clock_reply_t`](/documentation/kernel/clock_reply_t)[`clock_res_t`](/documentation/kernel/clock_res_t)[`clock_sec_t`](/documentation/kernel/clock_sec_t)[`clock_serv_port_t`](/documentation/kernel/clock_serv_port_t)[`clock_serv_t`](/documentation/kernel/clock_serv_t)[`clock_t`](/documentation/kernel/clock_t)[`clock_usec_t`](/documentation/kernel/clock_usec_t)[`clockinfo`](/documentation/kernel/clockinfo)
